meta.title: Getting started with new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin
meta.summary: The all new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin allows you to setup, package, run, start, stop and redeploy easily with a very little configuration resulting in a less verbose pom.xml.

meta.title: Vert.x featuring Continuous Delivery with Jenkins and Ansible
meta.summary: This blog entry describes an approach to adopt Continuous Delivery for Vert.x applications using Jenkins and Ansible by taking advantage of the Jenkins Job DSL and Ansible plugins.

meta.title: Unit and Integration Tests
meta.summary: Let’s refresh our mind about what we developed so far in the introduction to vert.x series. We forgot an important task. We didn’t test the API.

meta.title: Contract Driven REST Services with Vert.x3
meta.summary: We see a new trend in development where we are shifting from developing applications to APIs. More and more we see services being offered as REST APIs that we are allowed to consume.

meta.title: Combine vert.x and mongo to build a giant
meta.summary: This blog post is part of the introduction to Vert.x series. We are now going to replace this JDBC client by the vertx-mongo-client, and thus connect to a Mongo database.
